newsitem.title: FRANCE: FRANCE SELLS 22.58 BLN FFR OATS AT AUCTION.
newsitem.headline: FRANCE SELLS 22.58 BLN FFR OATS AT AUCTION.

text.p: The Treasury sold the following government bonds (OATs) at auction on Thursday.
MATURITY COUPON SALE AMOUNT AVERAGE YIELD
BID AMT/COVER NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE
PCT ALLOTED AT LOWEST PRICE* PAYMENT DATE

04.SEP

MATURITY COUPON SALE AMOUNT AVERAGE YIELD
BID AMT/COVER NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE

NOTE - The Treasury originally announced it would sell 21 to 23 billion francs of OATs in total. The total bid cover ratio of the auction was 1.9.
-- Paris Newsroom +33 1 4221 5452
